title: At a charity ball, New York City
marks: Signature and Stamp LRC, in pencil: [Arthur Rothstein]
description: two women wearing ornate 18th century-style gowns; woman on left has tightly-curled hair and wears ornate necklace, earrings and bracelets; woman on right wears feathered headpiece
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Richard A. Hunter
